resources.string:
The romance of Nebula Watches and jewellery mesh in a delicate amalgamation of style and substance,of grace and glamour. 
Crafted from 18K solid gold, Nebula is an ode to the Indian grandeur, a celebration of craftsmanship and cutting edge technology. 
Intricate workmanship and designs in precious stones speak of a meticulous attention to detail hitherto unseen in watches. 
Timepieces from this collection feature sapphire crystal dials and Italian style pure leather straps from Europe designed to fit snugly around your wrist. 
The Nebula also comes with the added option of customized message engraving for that endearing personal touch. 
Each of these meticulously crafted timepieces comes with unique numbering and lifetime warranty.
